mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POINT (user_id, point, content, create_at) VALUES(#{userId}, #{point}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, point, content, create_at AS createAt FROM POINT WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_at desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDAR (user_id, create_at) VALUES(#{userId}, NOW() + INTERVAL 9 HOUR)
mapper.select: select cldr_id AS cldrId, user_id AS userId, create_at AS createAt from CALENDAR WHERE user_id = #{userId}
